about_the_game:
Fly High, Fight Hard, and Dominate the House!

Prepare for epic battles where tiny jetpack agents duke it out in gigantic, colorful household environments! PAN GUN is a fast-paced third-person shooter with dynamic jetpack mechanics, customizable characters, and over-the-top combat. Soar through kitchens, living rooms, and garages, taking down rivals and massive bosses in this intense and vibrant shooter!

Key Features:

  • Jetpack-Fueled Combat

    Master the art of flight as you engage in chaotic mid-air battles. Use your jetpack to dodge enemy fire, close the distance, and gain the upper hand in vertical combat!

  • Your Home, Their Arena

    Common household items in the living room, kitchen, garage, office, such as tables, chairs and appliances, become tactical shelters and observation points on high ground. Each room is a battlefield with a unique design and game tactics.

  • Tiny Agents with Real Guns

    Unlock and personalize unique agents with own abilities and huge arsenal of guns. Customize their jetpacks, helmets and outfit. Upgrade your weapons. Fight with style and firepower! 

  • Epic Boss Fights

    Team up with friends or go solo to take on gigantic, menacing bosses. These epic battles will test your skills and cooperation!

  • Free-For-All, Battle Royale and more

    Fight with other players in crazy and fun Free-for-all matches, survive in Battle Royale, capture control points. Do you remember "The Floor is Lava" game? We have it too! Whether you prefer intense competition alone or team up with friends, everyone will find their favorite mode!

Prepare for epic battles where tiny jetpack agents duke it out in gigantic, colorful household environments! PAN GUN is a fast-paced third-person shooter with dynamic jetpack mechanics, customizable characters, and over-the-top combat. name: PAN GUN

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Core i5-6600K / Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050Ti / Radeon RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Core i5-10600K / Ryzen 5 5600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2070 / Radeon RX 5700
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space

short_description: A fast-paced fun PvP shooter where tiny agents equipped with jetpacks battle in massive household arenas. Fly, shoot, and outsmart opponents in exciting game modes, and team up to take down epic bosses!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Danish, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Turkish, Hungarian, Vietnamese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Thai, Ukrainian, Czech, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
